word: JESUS PRESENTS OUR POORLYWORDED PRAYERS TO THE FATHER.\97Every sincere prayer is heard in heaven. It may not be fluently expressed; but if the heart is in it, it will ascend to the sanctuary where Jesus ministers, and He will present it to the Father without one awkward, stammering word, beautiful and fragrant with the incense of His own perfection.\97(The Desire of Ages, 667.)
